body_html: Generally speaking tensorflow and bazel is not supported before CentOS 7. I am aware that people have gotten tensorflow built on CentOS 6, and so it may be possible to also do on CentOS 5, but it will probably require some ddebugging effort on your part. You should also post the entire build log (as an attachment).

body: Generally speaking tensorflow and bazel is not supported before CentOS 7. I am aware that people have gotten tensorflow built on CentOS 6, and so it may be possible to also do on CentOS 5, but it will probably require some ddebugging effort on your part. You should also post the entire build log (as an attachment).
